channel.title: Docs on Zeus
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Zeus

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Current energy crisis An energy efficient household, which has an idea about the future can optimize its consumption in the present, to preserve energy. This can be achieved by using machine learning methods, which are now commonly used in various industries everywhere, to make systems smart and study patterns invisible to the human eye. A smart home, integrated with these methods can save energy by itself, without the resident ever needing to constantly worry about the next day.
